{
  "insights": [
    "Day ended with wait action due to no LLM response; zero progress and zero profit.",
    "Reliance on a single LLM path caused inaction; no fallback executed.",
    "Lack of retries/health-checks/alerts allowed a silent failure to consume the day."
  ],
  "memory_additions": [
    "Add 3-step retry with backoff (30s, 2m, 5m) before choosing wait.",
    "If no LLM response in 10m, execute a pre-defined low-risk task and log incident.",
    "Run a morning LLM health-check; record latency and availability.",
    "Send alert on first retry failure; include trace IDs and last prompt.",
    "Keep a standby 'progress task' to run when LLM is unavailable.",
    "Track daily LLM response rate; escalate provider switch if <95% over 3 days."
  ],
  "risk_flags": [
    "Single-point failure: LLM dependency",
    "Opportunity cost from idle days",
    "Missing alerting for silent failures"
  ],
  "next_day_hypotheses": [
    "Implementing retries and a 10m timeout will reduce idle days to near zero.",
    "A morning health-check will catch outages early and guide plan adjustments.",
    "A predefined fallback task ensures measurable progress despite LLM issues.",
    "Alerting on first failure will speed investigation and recovery."
  ]
}
